Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is an all-solid-state chemical power generation device that converts chemical energy into electrical energy in an efficient and environmentally friendly way in medium- and high-temperature environments.
Titulo: Effects of a cooling channel on the creep damage and failure probability of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the thermal stresses and creep damage are inevitably generated at high temperatures, which easily leads to mechanical failure or failure of the whole SOFC stack.
Titulo: Effects of a cooling channel on the creep damage and failure probability of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Reducing the thermal stress generated by the uneven temperature distribution inside the SOFC stack has become a key problem to be solved urgently.
Titulo: Effects of a cooling channel on the creep damage and failure probability of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this paper, the thermal stress, creep damage, and failure behavior under their working conditions were analyzed by the finite element method.
Titulo: Effects of a cooling channel on the creep damage and failure probability of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Then, the cooling channel was proposed to reduce the thermal stress and creep damage.
Titulo: Effects of a cooling channel on the creep damage and failure probability of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results show that adding the cooling channel to SOFC stack can reduce the creep damage and failure probability.
Titulo: Effects of a cooling channel on the creep damage and failure probability of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The lower the cooling temperature, the better the cooling effect, and the lower the creep damage and failure probability.
Titulo: Effects of a cooling channel on the creep damage and failure probability of planar solid oxide fuel cells
